page.title: 14LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: 1) As you should know there are many different types of leisure. e.g. { Tennis, Squash, Hockey are all things that come under leisure sun-bathing and swimming are also leisures. 2) Leisure isn't just a sport, but can be reading, gardenin, knitting, sewing or even watching Television. 3) In Wrexham most people spend their spare time on a Saturday either going to town or going swimming,going to Bingo at night. Most teenagers either go to Youth Club or play Football. Old people go to bowling. 4) Familys go swimming as it is a place where people can enjoy themselves. A lot of old people go swimming. 5) Not all children like to go to town or play tennis but would rather go to a park and play on the swings, slides or roundabouts.
